root.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
root.description: OverviewWho Wants to be a Milionaire is a video game based on the hit game show of the same name. The game isn't an exact emulation of the show as, unlike in the TV show, you have only a limited amount of time to answer each question. One area in which the game does follow the TV version is that the game is one player only. There is a two player mode, but the only time both players are playing simultaneously is during the fastest finger/qualifying question.

similar_games.game: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire
